page.title: 14INTERVIEW CONTD.
page.content: A:Yes,under exceptional circumstances .The sisters are usually allowed a period of about six months to decide before taking the three final vows. Q:How do you celebrate Christmas ?. A:They celebrate Christmas in the same way as us-with turkey,presents and Christmas pudding. Q: Do you ever have a holiday?. A: Yes they go away in the Spring and Autumn to Porthcurno,Cornwall. Q: What is your favourite hobby?. A: We like knitting and gardening,jig_ saws,making things to sell,cooking, reading,listening to music. Q: What is your favourite memory?. A: When Sister Mary was praying with a old man when he was dying. Q: Do you like wearing your habits?. A:Yes,we wear dungarees for gardening and farming.Our habits are very special because they remind us of God.
